snippet.title: Lord Ambermaze - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: See some of the enemies you'll face, gameplay, and the world of Lord Ambermaze in this trailer for the upcoming adventure RPG. Lord Ambermaze features a turn-based combat system and time manipulation mechanics – only your steps can force the flow of time to move. Delve into the depths of the underworld to challenge the evil Lord and restore time. The Lord Ambermaze Prologue is coming soon to Steam.
